title: What are the faculties of the human mind? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you understand the difference between intelligence and intellectual knowledge you will be in the right path. Be the seeker of truth. Climb your own mountain so that you’ll experience the whole purpose of your being. If you can understand what is the difference between intellect versus intelligence is, you got your answer.
The mind is a part of the human soul. The soul is the mind (intellect), will, emotions and memory. The soul is designed to live forever.
